title: CLOCOR Women's Plus Size Midi Dress 3/4 Sleeve A-Line Swing Dress V Neck Flowy Casual Dresses
description: Features: This plus size dresses for curvy women features V neck, 3/4 sleeve, hide pocket, stretchy waist and shirred bodice design, which makes this dress a perfect symbol of elegance.
Multiple size & Colors: The mid-length midi dress with multiple solid color and six sizes (from XL-6XL) is qualified for any dress requirement from ladies with different body size.
Premium Materials: Made of 95% polyester + 5% spandex, the fabric of this elegant midi dress is soft and stretchy, the breathable fabric ensures comfort for daily wearing.

Occasions & Match: This stylish cocktail midi dress with sleeves is perfect for casual, workout, wedding, dating, cocktail, banquet or family reunion. It's easy to dressed up with high heels and jewelry.
Garment Care&Note: Wash in cold water, please do not bleach. There may be 0.5-1 inch inaccuracy due to manual measure, hope for your understanding.
